RelatedSentence: The Parliament has finished the discussions of the first reading of the package of the bill on amendments to the Law of the Republic of Armenia On education , which proposes to replace the mandatory 9 - year education with 12 years .

In the opinion of the Minister of Science and Education of the Republic of Armenia Armen Ashotyan , as a result , the adoption of the package will allow 3-5 thousand children a year to receive free education .
